title: Tons of bugs since the update to chat!
body:
Ever since the update to chat a few days ago I disconnect from chat constantly, I have really bad connection issues, I usually disconnect right before loading screen and have to relog, and lastly once I hit continue after EVERY match the game disappears. 
Edit: Also if chat disconnects in que the timer still goes but it will never find a game. You have to leave que and start again

replies.body: I was looking over somethings before starting another game and "Logging onto chat service . . ." popped up. Logged off and back in again but that doesn't help. I can chat in game fine but pregame or seeing friends online is a no go.
All it says for me is "logging into chat service" in the lobby. I cant type a single thing until I get into the game
I'm having issues as well. I can't connect to chat at all. And I also couldn't talk in pre-game lobby.(someone dodged so didn't find out if I could talk in game)
